title: This Movie Suck
review: Well Mr. Speilberg did it again.I'm waitng for him to make an adult movie.this one is the worse of the bunch.I agree there is lots of special effects and maybe too much.I watch this thing twice and I'm so dazzle by the special effects that I lost track of the story.I might not be fair to Mr. Cruise I never like this actor but in this movie his talent is completly lost.Do yourself a favor and stay away from this crap.What a waste of money.
